member.name: T:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GenerationContext

member.summary: Types that have already been generated for a group of types in the current call to Generator.Generate()

member.summary: Checks if a type has already been generated for a type group in the current context

member.summary: Checks if a type dependency has already been generated for a currently generated type. This method also returns true if the argument is the currently generated type itself.

member.name: T:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions
member.summary: Options for generating TypeScript files

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.FileNameConverters
member.summary: A collection (chain) of converters used for converting C# file names to TypeScript file names

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.TypeNameConverters
member.summary: A collection (chain) of converters used for converting C# type names (classes, enums etc.) to TypeScript type names

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.PropertyNameConverters
member.summary: A collection (chain) of converters used for converting C# class property names to TypeScript class property names

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.EnumValueNameConverters
member.summary: A collection (chain) of converters used for converting C# enum value names to TypeScript enum value names

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.EnumStringInitializersConverters
member.summary: A collection (chain) of converters used for converting C# enum value names to TypeScript enum string initializers

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.ExplicitPublicAccessor
member.summary: Whether to generate explicit "public" accessor in TypeScript classes

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.SingleQuotes
member.summary: Whether to use single quotes instead of double quotes in TypeScript sources

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.TypeScriptFileExtension
member.summary: File extension used for the generated TypeScript files

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.TabLength
member.summary: Number of space characters per tab

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.BaseOutputDirectory
member.summary: The base directory for generating TypeScript files. Any relative paths defined in ExportTs... attributes (OutputDir) will be resolved relatively to this path.

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.CreateIndexFile
member.summary: Whether to create an index file which exports all generated types

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.IndexFileGenerators
member.summary: Handles how the index file(s) are created for generated types.

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.CsNullableTranslation
member.summary: Indicates which union types (null, undefined) are added to TypeScript property types for C# nullable types by default

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.DefaultValuesForTypes
member.summary: Specifies default values to generate for given TypeScript types

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.CustomTypeMappings
member.summary: Custom [C# -> TS] type mappings. C# type name must be a full type name (e.g. "SomeNs.My.Type"). Specified C# types will be always translated to the corresponding TypeScript types.

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.EnumStringInitializers
member.summary: Indicates whether to use enum string initializers

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.FileHeading
member.summary: Heading section (initial section) of a TypeScript file. By default it's "This is a TypeGen auto-generated file. (...)"

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.UseDefaultExport
member.summary: Whether to use default exports for the generated TypeScript types

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.Generator.GeneratorOptions.IndexFileExtension
member.summary: The file extension to use for the index file(s). Defaults to whatever is set for TypeScriptFileExtension.

member.name: M:TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.IndexFileGenerator.Generate(TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.IIndexFileGeneratorParams)
member.summary: Generates an `index.ts` file(s) which exports types within the generated files
member.returns: Generated TypeScript file paths (relative to the Options.BaseOutputDirectory)

member.summary: Gets text within specified tag(s). If tag(s) occurs multiple times, concatenated text from all occurrences is returned. Returns an empty string if a file does not exist.

member.name: M:TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.ITypeDependencyService.GetTypeDependencies(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all non-simple and non-collection types the given type depends on. Types of properties/fields marked with TsIgnoreAttribute will be omitted. Returns an empty array if no dependencies were detected. Returns a distinct result (i.e. no duplicate TypeDependencyInfo instances)
member.exception: Thrown when the type is null

member.name: M:TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.ITypeService.IsTsSimpleType(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if a type has a TypeScript simple type representation
member.returns: True if a corresponding TypeScript simple type exists; false otherwise.

member.name: M:TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.ITypeService.GetTsSimpleTypeName(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets TypeScript type name for a simple type. Simple type must be one of: object, bool, string, int, long, float, double, decimal; or any type specified in GeneratorOptions.CustomMappings.
member.param: one of: object, bool, string, int, long, float, double, decimal; or any type specified in GeneratorOptions.CustomMappings
member.returns: TypeScript type name. Null if the passed type cannot be represented as a TypeScript simple type.

member.name: M:TypeGen.Core.Generator.Services.ITypeService.IsTsClass(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether the type represents a TypeScript class
member.returns: True if the type represents a TypeScript class; false otherwise
member.exception: Thrown if the type is null

member.summary: Determines whether the type represents a TypeScript class
member.returns: True is the type represents a TypeScript class; false otherwise
member.exception: Thrown if the type is null

member.summary: Specifies custom base class declaration for a TypeScript class or interface. Base class declaration is empty if no content is specified.

member.summary: Base class/interface type name

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.TypeAnnotations.TsCustomBaseAttribute.ImportPath
member.summary: The path of custom base type file to import (can be left null if no imports are required)

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.TypeAnnotations.TsCustomBaseAttribute.OriginalTypeName
member.summary: The original TypeScript base type name. This property should be used when the specified Base differs from the original base type name defined in the file under ImportPath. This property should only be used in conjunction with ImportPath.

member.name: P:TypeGen.Core.TypeAnnotations.TsCustomBaseAttribute.IsDefaultExport
member.summary: Whether default export is used for the referenced TypeScript type - used only in combination with ImportPath

member.summary: TsCustomBaseAttribute constructor

The original TypeScript type name, defined in the file under ImportPath - used only if type alias is specified
Whether default export is used for the referenced TypeScript type - used only in combination with importPath

member.name: T:TypeGen.Core.TypeAnnotations.TsDefaultExportAttribute

member.summary: Whether default export is used for the referenced TypeScript type - used only in combination with ImportPath
